title: Katie Price's ex Charles Drury fuels Love Island rumours
text:
The builder took to Instagram to put the record straight (Pictures: ITV/REX/Instagram)

Katie Price’s ex-boyfriend Charles Drury appeared to fuel rumours that he’s appearing on the winter series of Love Island.

Rumours started circulating after the newly single builder posted a couple of cryptic posts to Instagram.

A source told The Sun Online: ‘He was approached last year but was seeing someone at the time – but now he’s single, producers called him up and asked him to re-audition for the show.

‘Nothing’s signed yet and he’s not even sure if he wants to do it but they’re keen to meet him. Katie will be furious when she finds out – he’d have girls falling over him, and he’s bound to talk about what dating Katie was like if he makes it into the villa.’

It was rumoured that Charles Drury was going to be on the winter series of Love Island (Picture: charlesdrury1)

In one post Charles said: ‘You never forget the one who touched your heart; regardless whether it’s the ones of broke or healed it.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

He soon followed the Instagram story with another post which read: ‘Good things come to those who wait. But better things come to those who work for it.’

But sadly, Pricey’s ex then posted another picture of a love heart and a palm tree with the caption ‘fake news’.

The builder took to Instagram with a cryptic post (Picture: @charlesdrury1)

The news also follows after Katie’s ex refused to sign an NDA, being left ‘furious’ about the recent photos of her with Kris Boyson.

It’s said that the builder, who had moved into Katie’s Sussex home, is fuming after he carried out jobs around the house.

A source said: ‘Katie wanted Charles to come to the house and talk things out – she’s been begging him not to leave and to take her back.

‘But he’s still fuming over her cheating on him and embarrassing him so told her he’s not interested. That’s when she asked him to sign an NDA (non disclosure agreement) saying he wouldn’t speak about her in public or tell his mates anything about their relationship,’ they added to The Sun Online.

It was claimed that Pricey asked Charles to sign a non disclosure agreement (Picture: Beretta/Sims/REX)

Katie and Kris broke up earlier this year (Picture: Kris Boyson/Instagram)

It comes after Katie was pictured sneaking out of her ex-fiancé Kris Boyson’s house in a hoodie and baseball cap.

She was spotted strapping her two young children into the car, while Kris shut the door for her.

However, Charles was apparently not happy in the slightest after she was caught out.

Katie Price’s management has been contacted for a comment.
